title: Sign in
signInKeyDescription: Enter the form sign-in key emailed to you when you were provided access to the form.
signInKeyReset: Request a reset (opens in new tab)
loginInvalidCredentialsErrorMessage: Double-check your email and form sign-in key are correct
loginEmailErrorMessage: Double-check your email before trying again.
loginSignInKeyErrorMessage: Double-check the form sign-in key before trying again.
loginInternalErrorTitle: There was a problem with the web page
remainingNumberOfLoginAttemptsErrorMessa: You have tried to sign in
times. This account will be locked after 10 tries.

temporaryToken.title: Check your email
temporaryToken.instructions: We've sent you a one-time-use, 6-digit verification code by email. It may take a few minutes to arrive.
temporaryToken.retryPrompt: Double-check your login key and email then
